item.description:
We had a couple events over the summer that were fairly successful, we've got many more folks signed up now, so I'm looking forward to an even bigger turnout.

Please come and bring your French speaking friends. The meetup is currently set to expire mid-November - so one of the things this event will do is help me gauge whether there is sufficient interest to keep the group going.

Look forward to seeing/meeting you!

Paul

group.name: The Boston Metrowest French Language Meetup

item.name: The long awaiting next meetup!
